about_the_game:
This game is a PC based third person top-down puzzle game. The inspiration for the game comes from various physical laws in daily life. The overall art style of the game is "minimalist sci-fi style". The story background of the game is set in the near future, and players will play as a tester, completing various tests on the newly invented "technology element" while uncovering the secrets hidden behind the "technology element" and its inventor "Dr. Harrison".

During the game, players need to use the keyboard to control the movement of the game character, while selecting different "technology element" and using mouse clicks to add "technology element" to surrounding objects. Objects with applied "technology element" will have special physical states, such as being more elastic, smoother, and heavier. The game is divided into multiple levels, and players need to use these objects with "technology element" applied to help them reach the end of each level. At the same time, there will be some props on the way, and by collecting these items, players can unlock hidden levels and true endings, revealing the true plot hidden beneath the surface.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64 (single core, at least 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card or discrete graphics card, supporting DirectX 9.0c, with at least 256 MB of video memory
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c
